text: Many thanks for this beer to kevnic2008. Mala pianka i malo zostawia wasow na szklance Paulanera. Kolor jaskrawy zloty, oczywiscie klarowny jak to w tym stylu. Aromat lekki jakby mloda gotowana kapusta? W smaku zdecydowanie intensywny slodzony mus jablkowo-gruszkowy, ciut jeszcze bananow. Troche ogolnie i ostatecznie za slodkie.
Bottle. Golden color. Orange and banana in the aroma. Wheaty sweetish floral flavor with orange and banana. Just enough character, decent kristall weizen.
Bottle thanks to Benzai. Pours yellow gold white head - Nose/taste of sweet grain, banana, wheat, metallic notes and lemon - light bodied.
Bottle @ Benzai 10k afterparty. Aroma is hay, malt, some lemon, touch of metal. Flavour is grassy herbal hops, fruity lemony touches. Refreshing.

Bottle @ Benzais 10K afterparty. Clear golden color, average to medium sized white to off-white head. Smell and taste wheat, lightly sweet, slightly grainy. Soft velvety texture, smooth mouthfeel. Quite pleasant.
Bottle. Clean gold with decent carbonation. Aroma is yeast and fruit. Flavour is citrus, yeast and wheat with a mild banana finish.
500ml Flasche. Ins Glas ergießt sich ein klares goldgelbes Bier, viel CO2, viel Schaum. Geruch hefig, leicht malzig fruchtig. Geschmack hefig, fruchtig, im Abgang leicht würzig.
Bottle from mein-biershop. Clear golden with a fluffy white head. Malty with a fruity touch and some shy hops.
Hazy yellow colour. Small stable white head. Mild banana flavour, quite weak. Good wheaty mouthfeel. Slightly spicy flavour. Nice and clean, but a little mild.

Its golden with a creamy, white head. The aroma has notes of yeast, fruit, banana and wheat. The sweet flavor has notes of yeast, fruit, banana and wheat and the finish is spicy. This could easily be the written words of hefe weizen - so the notes are stronger than usual for a Kristall, a very nice Kristall!
Bottle. Nice head with good duration. Color is golden and semi kristall. Aroma and taste are yeast, smooth wheat malt, banana, fruits and hops.
Bottle @ Aarhus tasting. Hazy yellow with a white head. Aroma is sweet, wheaty, yeasty and banana. Flavor is quite sweet. Sweet finish. Strange and flat finish. 050313
Bottle. Slightly hazy yellow with medium white head. Aroma is malt, wheat, yeast and banana. Flavour is malt, wheat, yeast, banana, medium sweet and spices.
Bottle, picked up in amberg. Quite a dry version of the style with a cider-like appearance, faint sourness, hints of herb vinegar, dry and crisp finish. Not a bad beer to start a session with
Bottled,pale golden with a puffy white head..Sweet fruity aroma with notes of apples,melon,grain,yeast,clove with a touch or sourness.

Bottled 500ml (MBS, BB 08/2012)
Clear golden color, small steady white creamy head. Light banana-rubber aroma. Light to medium bodied. Sweetish malty, some banana esters. Finish has some more harsh notes. Light lingering sweetness in the aftertaste. Quite typical Kristallweizen.

500 ml bottle. From mein-biershop.de.
Clear lively pale golden colour with big fluffy white head.
Fruits, banana, wheat and mild caramel in aroma.
Flavour is banana, grain, mild grassy bitterness and metal. 
Watery and thin. Not that enjoyable.
Bottle from mein-biershop.de. Clear golden color with medium white head. Aroma of wheat, malt, earthy notes. Taste, banana, wheat, metallic notes. Bittersweet finish. Drinkable beer.

train bottle.  its funny because it sounds like "fucks". moderately strong banana flesh nose, fresh and estery light apple juice character throughout.  light body, medium frothiness, light caramel apple stew flavor, overall not as bad as the falk but still not something I would consider good. oily lingering browned banana finish. mild wheat. meh.

Bottle. Golden, very small and fully diminishing head. Moderate, malty  wheaty and sweetish aroma, some fruitiness and light banana, faint spiciness. Body is light to medium, malty  lightly wheaty and sweetish flavor, faint spiciness. Finish is short to average, malty  lightly wheaty and lightly sweetish, light spiciness, faint alcohol. Sweetish weizen - OK but really nothing special.

Bottled (from mein-biershop.de). Orange colour, mediumsized slightly off-white head. Aroma is wheat, mild spices, quite much citrus as well. Flavour is caramel, wheat, some citrus and mild spicy notes as well.

Bottle 50cl. @ home.Clear medium yellow orange color with a average to large, frothy, good lacing, fully lasting, white to off-white head. Aroma is light to moderate malty, fruity, light to moderate yeasty, banana, vanilla. Flavor is moderate fruity and vanilla sweet with a average to long duration. Body is medium, texture is creamy, carbonation is soft. [20090525]

Bottle (im Brauereigasthof gekauft) Nicht ganz klar, ziemlich sprudelnd mit einer durchschnittlichen, aber ziemlich stabilen weißen Schaumkrone, süssliche Weizenaromen, gemischt mit zarten Orangentönen bestimmen das Aroma; angenehm süsslicher Geschmack, fast vollmundig und weich; süsse Fruchtnoten, hauptsächlich Zitrusfrüchte im Abgang, abgerundet durch eine sehr verhaltene Herbheit. Wesentlich aromatischer als andere, eher überflüssige Kristallweizen...........

Bottle, kindly sent by pivnizub. Hazy golden, low off-white head. Clove and mineral aroma. Fairly spicy and dry, mango, banana, clove, coriander. Sparkly mouthfeel, still good bite in it, not as thin as other kristalls. plasantly fruity retronasal. Quite nice.

(bottle) Hazy (!), pale golden colour with a thick foamy white head. Moderately sweet grainy malt aroma with strong notes of banana and a touch of citrus and vanilla. Moderately sweet flavour with a faint touch of acidity, light to medium bodied with a well-carbonated, almost mellow mouthfeel. Grainy and fruity taste; sweet and grainy, banana-fruity finish with light notes of cloves and nutmeg.
